category.name: Manufacturing
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: MES_3DPDF_UPDATE_WORKFLOW_BATCH_INTERVAL
preference.preference_description: Specifies the time interval in seconds after which the MES-Update3DPDFReports action handler checks for the request status when updating 3D PDF documents before sending them to a manufacturing execution system. Valid Values: Accepts a positive integer value.
